snippet: LERNER--Richard, 102. Devoted husband of the late Ruth Lerner, loving dad, granddad and great-granddad, tennis champ (until 101) and avid golfer at Banyan Country Club died peacefully at home on February 3, 2016. He will be missed greatly. Madeline, Ralph and Nora 1/3
